name: Amgueddfa
description:
Amgueddfa is a game based on the sites and collections of Amgueddfa Cyrmu-National Museum Wales.

Built by Blind Sky Studios within a 2 week period, alongside workshops with young people from across Wales who helped to design the puzzle and narrative elements.

This game weaves together heritage, museum artefacts and young people’s personal interpretations and stories.

Amgueddfa is a game which will continue to grow, as young people help us to develop and design new chapters.

What will you discover in this museum of memories?

-----------------------

CONTROLS

WASD.............Movement
Space...............Jump
Left click.........Interact | pick up/throw
Right click.......Zoom
Esc..................Quit
